version_description:
Possibilità di trasferire e ricevere credito tra utenti
Possibilità di disabilitare la Localizzazione con App in background
Possibilità di disconnettersi automaticamente dopo singolo acquisto

Sitael S.p.A. has developed this new version of the app to enrich the customer experience and increase customer engagement.
From now on special promos and discounts will be available, together with the opportunity to top-up other users.
The section dedicated to reports, accessible from the hamburger menu, has been furtherly improved, through the introduction of a specific list where it’s possible to select the kind of malfunction or the payment method where the user experienced credit issues.
A graphic redesign has revamped the user interface, which is now more modern and appealing.
Minor bug fixes related to temporary crashes have finally been carried out.

Minor bug fixes related to temporary crashes have finally been carried out.

Sitael S.p.A. has developed this new version of the app to enrich the customer experience and increase customer engagement.
From now on special promos and discounts will be available, together with the opportunity to top-up other users.
The section dedicated to reports, accessible from the hamburger menu, has been furtherly improved, through the introduction of a specific list where it’s possible to select the kind of malfunction or the payment method where the user experienced credit issues.
A graphic redesign has revamped the user interface, which is now more modern and appealing.
Minor bug fixes related to temporary crashes have finally been carried out.

Credit card has been added among the wallet top-up methods.
A graphic redesign has revamped the promotion section, which is now more modern and appealing.
New product functionalities have finally been included in order to allow compliance to the new GDPR regulation.

Credit card has been added among the wallet top-up methods.

A graphic redesign has revamped the promotion section, which is now more modern and appealing.

New product functionalities have finally been included in order to allow compliance to the new GDPR regulation.

Sitael S.p.A. ha previsto questo nuovo rilascio per rendere l'esperienza utente più fluida e immediata.
Da oggi le operazioni di ricarica online saranno effettuate in modalità one-click, grazie alla memorizzazione dei dati della carta di credito dell'utente dopo la prima ricarica.
L'abilitazione della localizzazione è stata resa opzionale.
Sono state inoltre introdotte nuove funzionalità di sintesi vocale per facilitare l'utilizzo dell'app da parte di utenti non vedenti.
Sono stati infine risolti dei bug relativi a malfunzionamenti momentanei presenti nella versione precedente.

- Navigazione migliorata attraverso il menu laterale: ora le sezioni "Privacy e Termini" e "Tutorial" sono disponibili direttamente su menu laterale
- Bug fix
We update the app in order to allow the best shopping experience. Download the latest version that presents resolution to some technical issues and multiple performance improvements.

We update our app to offer you an ever better service. With this latest update, we have improved the user experience and performance.

How does it work?
- Bring your device closer to the vending machine;
- Top up your wallet with coins or credit card;
- Enjoy your break!

If you registered using your phone number but you no longer remember your PIN, check the message section of your device or request a new one by clicking on "New Pin".

We update our app to offer you an ever better service. With this latest update, we have improved the user experience and performance.

How does it work?
- Bring your device closer to the vending machine;
- Top up your wallet with coins or credit card;
- Enjoy your break!

If you registered using your phone number but you no longer remember your PIN, check the message section of your device or request a new one by clicking on "New Pin".

È disponibile una nuova versione dell'app! Aggiorniamo costantemente i nostri servizi al fine di migliorare l'esperienza d'acquisto.
Con questo aggiornamento rilasciamo una nuova veste grafica del Loyalty Stars ed inoltre abbiamo risolto alcuni bug minori. Come funziona l'APP?
- Registrati;
- Avvicina il tuo device al distributore automatico;
- Ricarica il tuo wallet con monete o carta di credito;
